about_the_game:
A great selection of character animations to boost your GameGuru MAX collection!

There are over 150+ animations in this pack that cover the following categories:

  • Additional combat stances for rifle, pistol, and shotgun
  • General activities and conversations
  • Sitting and sleeping
  • Idle animations
  • Death poses

These animations are created by the highly respected GameGuru artist and community member Mark Blosser AKA Bond1 and will give your games a more unique look and feel for levels that use neutral, ally, and enemy characters.

Here is a detailed list of all spot animations included with this booster pack:

Activities Animations:

  • applauding
  • bow formal
  • bow kneel
  • bow standing
  • cooking skillet
  • crafting workbench
  • gardening gathering
  • hammering wall
  • handsaw
  • kneeling cleaning loop
  • kneeling cleaning start
  • kneeling cleaning stop
  • ritual dance
  • ritual spin dance
  • ritual stomp dance
  • salute
  • shovel dig
  • sit play drum
  • stock shelves
  • waving to crowd
  • wipe countertop

Chair Animations:

  • chair sit arms crossed
  • chair sit arms on table
  • chair sit down
  • chair sit idle
  • chair sit table tired
  • chair sit talk calm
  • chair sit talk excited
  • chair stand up

Corpses Animations:

  • corpse against wall 1
  • corpse against wall 2
  • corpse bobbing in water
  • corpse ground face down
  • corpse ground face up
  • corpse impaled face down
  • corpse impaled face up

Ground Animations:

  • ground sit down

  • ground sit stand up
  • ground sleep idle

Idles Animations:

  • idlebreak stretch
  • idlebreak waving

Melee Animations:

  • attack left jab
  • attack pistolwhip

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: GameGuru MAX Animation Booster Pack - $29.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy GameGuru MAX Animation Booster Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 | AMD Opteron 4274 HE, or better.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon R9 Fury, with 4 GB VRAM, or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 | AMD Opteron 4274 HE, or better.
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 | Radeon 5700 XT, with 8 GB VRAM, or better
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse

short_description: A great selection of 150+ character animations to boost your GameGuru MAX collection!
